text: 🚨Measles Update! 💉👍Did you know that accelerated immunization activities have prevented an estimated 57 million deaths from measles between 2000-2022? 😱 That's thanks to the combined efforts of countries, @WHO, the Measles & Rubella Partnership, and other international partners! 🤝In 2022, 74% of children received both doses of the measles vaccine, and about 83% of the world's children received one dose by their first birthday. 🎉The Measles & Rubella Initiative (now the Measles and Rubella Partnership) and @Gavi have been instrumental in supporting measles vaccination efforts, mostly in the WHO African Region and Gavi-supported countries. 🌐Let's keep up the good work! The Immunization Agenda 2030 Measles & Rubella Partnership (M&RP) is leading the charge to achieve the IA2030 measles and rubella specific targets. 💪Join us in the fight against measles and for a world where every child has access to life-saving vaccines! 🌟
